name: STARSTRUCK (itch) (Yoroiookami)
description:
It's a tale about a monk who decided to prove himself worthy of following in his master's footsteps, by beating up hordes of enemies. It's by no means a serious game with serious characters. It offers ugly, yet charming homemade graphics, as well as fantastic music made by Final Perigee. Much nonsensical (but PG!) violence is to be expected.

This game was made for the Touch The Stars game jam in under 2 weeks. Since this game jam is about pushing the limits of RPG Maker, I decided to go with a beat-em-up kind of game. There may be some bugs though...
